synopsis.text: Isayamaâ€™s epic manga, Attack on Titan, continues its thrilling narrative in Season 3 (Part 2) as Eren Yeager and the valiant Scout Regiment embark on a daring mission to reclaim Wall Maria and restore hope to humanity. Armed with Eren's newly acquired hardening ability, the Scouts are optimistic about sealing the wall and reclaiming the ravaged Shiganshina District. This victory could unlock the long-awaited secrets hidden within Eren's basement, and potentially, the world itself. However, the mission is far from easy as the cunning Reiner, Bertholdt, and the formidable Beast Titan have nefarious plans up their sleeves. As internal tensions among the Scouts rise and emotions run high, the squad must put their differences aside and unite for what could be humanity's last stand against the Titans. With the cheers of Trost District's inhabitants fueling their determination, Eren, Mikasa, Armin, and the rest of the Scout Regiment brace themselves for a battle that will determine the fate of mankind.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
